   var expertsList_position = new Array();    //json字串中的isOwner    var isOwner;    var obj;    var partialView = ''; 	//但發現由json傳回的isOwner為null，由partialView來判斷是否為isOwner			var isOwnerByPview = true;		    //取得json字串中的isOwner    str_advantage = str_advantage.replace(/(\n|\r|\t)/g,"").replace(/\\/g,"\");    if (str_advantage.length > 0) {	    obj = JSON.parse(str_advantage);	            	    isOwner = obj.args.isOwner;	    if (typeof(isOwner) == undefined || isOwner == null) {	    	isOwner = isOwnerByPview;	    }	    //處理電腦遴選，由專家學者資料庫	    	    processMatDbExpertsList();	    //處理自行遴選，由專家學者資料庫	    processMatExternalExperts3List();	    //處理自行遴選，非專家學者資料庫	    processMatExternalExperts0List();	    //處理內派委員    	    processMatInternalExpertsList();	}		var $jq=jQuery.noConflict();    if ($jq.cns == undefined) {    	$jq.cns = jQuery.cns;    }	$jq(document).ready(function(){		if ("4"!='2'  && "4"!='12'){							readyTreatyCheckText();		}				popWatermark();					$jq.blockUI({ message: $jq('#message_show'), css: {padding:'10px',overflow:'auto' }});			var height = Math.floor($jq(window).height()*0.6);			var width = Math.floor($jq(window).width()*0.8);			var top = Math.floor($jq(window).height()*0.2);			var left = Math.floor($jq(window).width()*0.1);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("width",width);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("height",height);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("left",left);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("top",top);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("overflow","auto");			});		function popWatermark(){        var msgTop = 50;        var msgLeft = 500;                try{        	msgTop = $jq("#printArea").position().top+50;        	msgLeft = $jq("#printArea").position().left +$jq("#printArea").width()/2 +50;		}catch(e) {}				$jq("#hidden_message_id")        .css({            fontSize: "100px", //watermark font size             color: "brown", //watermark color             fontWeight: "bolder", //watermark font weight             fontFamily: "verdana", //watermark font family             position: "absolute", //watermark position 必須為 "absolute"             width: "100px", //watermark div width             top: msgTop, //watermark position top             left: msgLeft //watermark position left         })        .fadeTo("fast",0.3); //watermark 透明度 	}	function popWatermark2(){        var msgTop = 200;        var msgLeft = 500;		$jq("#hidden_message_id")        .css({            fontSize: "120px", //watermark font size             color: "brown", //watermark color             fontWeight: "bolder", //watermark font weight             fontFamily: "verdana", //watermark font family             position: "absolute", //watermark position 必須為 "absolute"             width: "120px", //watermark div width             top: msgTop, //watermark position top             left: msgLeft //watermark position left         })        .fadeTo("fast",0.3); //watermark 透明度 	}BODY {	FONT-SIZE: 13pt}@media Print    {DIV.noPrint {	DISPLAY: none}}
